sections.Situation: Aya Ueto, who made a promise with Shinichi four years ago, comes back to his house to ask help for a case involving her neighbor and her daughter that died forty years ago, at the age of 17.

sections.Trivia: - Aya Ueto is a real-life Japanese idol who's a Detective Conan fan. She voiced her own character in this episode, and later the lawyer Kyoko Tachibana in Zero the Enforcer as a special guest.
